name: AppGreedy
tag_list: app, iphone-app, ipad-app, testing, review, earning-cash, itunes
overview:
It provides a gain-gain platform for Mobile Device(iPhone,iPad) application owners and their users.

How it works:

Application owner publish their application on our site with a user quota.

Users perceive the applications which are usually updated on daily basis.

User applies for testing the app on this website.

S/he has 24 hours to download the application, post rating and comment about it on iTunes.

After 24 hours pass, if user’s action is valid, s/he will be rewarded with a cash ranging 0.4 â‚¬ to 1.0 â‚¬

Therefore, users are happy because they make money by using applications as they do in a natural way.

App owners are happy since their applications are used and rated in iTunes which is very important for popularity.
